name: Mouse Shooter Maze Invader.. Aka, Throw the cheese.

description:
Mouse Shooter Maze Invader.. Aka, Throw the cheese.

The idea was to make a space shooter and a maze runner, during the creation it changed and is now what it is..

Hope you enjoy it, even if it's only a very simple prototype.

 - INCD021

This "game" was made in WAY to few hours for LD41..
